name: DownloadHelper - Hide Inactive, Compact Active
description:
Hide the DownloadHelper toolbar icon when it's inactive and hide the count and dropmarker at all times to work around the wasted space when the count is disabled.

(Recent versions allow the icon to show the same menu as the dropmarker via an option in General -> Behavior)
